data.name: Antique Throne
data.description: Giltwood antique throne with faux black leather upholstery. With elaborate carvings and scrolled arms, this throne is worthy for only the most regal of critters.

data.name: Velvet Chaise
data.description: Perfect for any animal smaller than a great dane, this hand-carved teak chaise lounge features soft red velvet upholstery.

data.name: Elephant Treat Table
data.description: Set out your favorite treats on this vintage wood table complete with carved elephant bases. Ivorybody will envy such a display!

data.name: 1800s Walnut Bed
data.description: This carved walnut bed has an additional cushioned canopy to accomate multiple critters of different sizes for guaranteed sweet dreams.

data.name: Mahogany Bookcase
data.description: Circa 1770, this George III bookcase displays your favorite books in true 18th Century style with gilt-wired central door and brass handles.

data.name: Outdoor Sunball Chair
data.description: Lounge comfortably in this groovy '60s swivel chair designed by Ris & Selldorf with an adjustable fiberglass canopy and weather-resistant upholstery.

data.name: 19th Century Bench
data.description: With corkscrew legs and columns carved from walnut and upholstered in linen, this French bench is perfect for smaller pets.

data.name: Whiskey Barrel Toy Box
data.description: Repurposed whiskey barrel to store lots of your favorite toys! Toys in the picture ARE included as an extra bonus!

data.name: Floral Sofa
data.description: Floral sofa dating from the 1950s. Features a low seat lined with floral fabric and intricately carved wood accents.
